last_episode_to_air.name: My Teen Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected
last_episode_to_air.overview: One final hurdle, and the prom situation will finally be over… but will Hachiman’s search for something genuine be so easily resolved?

name: My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU
original_name: やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。
overview: So exactly what’s going to happen when Hachiman Hikigaya, an isolated high school student with no friends, no interest in making any and a belief that everyone else’s supposedly great high school experiences are either delusions or outright lies, is coerced by a well meaning faculty member into joining the one member “Volunteer Services Club” run by Yukino Yukinoshita, who’s smart, attractive and generally considers everyone in her school to be her complete inferior?

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Hachiman Hikigaya is an apathetic high school student with narcissistic and semi-nihilistic tendencies. He firmly believes that joyful youth is nothing but a farce, and everyone who says otherwise is just lying to themselves.

In a novel punishment for writing an essay mocking modern social relationships, Hachiman's teacher forces him to join the Volunteer Service Club, a club that aims to extend a helping hand to any student who seeks their support in achieving their goals. With the only other club member being the beautiful ice queen Yukino Yukinoshita, Hachiman finds himself on the front line of other people's problems—a place he never dreamed he would be. As Hachiman and Yukino use their wits to solve many students' problems, will Hachiman's rotten view of society prove to be a hindrance or a tool he can use to his advantage?

seasons.name: TOO!
seasons.overview:
This season picks up immediately after the events of the first season, continuing the adventures of the Volunteer Service Club—the dispassionate Hachiman Hikigaya, the cheerful Yui Yuigahama, and the competitive Yukino Yukinoshita—as it dedicates itself to helping any student with issues that they may face.

With the rift among his own group widening, Hachiman begins to realize that his knack for quickly getting to the root of other people's troubles is a double-edged sword: sometimes the best solution is not necessarily the most appropriate one.

seasons.name: Climax
seasons.overview: The messy emotions of Hachiman, Yukino and Yui won't be easily expressed, and as the members of the Service Club band together to host a school prom, they will have to put their feelings into words and truly learn to understand each other at long last... if the Service Club can even stay afloat, that is!

episodes.name: Youth Romantic Comedy is Wrong, as I Expected
episodes.overview: Hachiman Hikigaya is a loner with an inferiority complex who is tricked into joining the "Service Club" that helps students with their problems… at all costs.

episodes.name: All People Surely Have Their Own Worries
episodes.overview: Hachiman bears witness as Yui tries to either fit in or break away from her social group. Later, the club receives a new request from an old friend of Hachiman’s.

episodes.name: Sometimes the Gods of Rom-Coms Does Nice Things
episodes.overview: As Hachiman continues to hone his skills in the art of being left alone, another student comes to him with a new request for the club.

episodes.name: In Other Words, He Doesn’t Have Many Friends
episodes.overview: Hachiman has a small crisis concerning little sisters and what they mean.  Afterward he receives a mysterious text, outlining the club’s next student request.

episodes.name: Once Again, He Turns Back on the Path from Whence He Came
episodes.overview: Hachiman’s sister is asks for advice from her classmates.  Apparently she has been acting strange lately, and the Service Club intends to find out why.

episodes.name: His Beginning With Her Finally Ends
episodes.overview: Shizuka announces that Hachiman and Yui must go on a recruitment drive to find more members, and they know exactly who to target.

episodes.name: Anyway, Getting No Rest, Even Though it’s Summer Break, Just Isn’t Right
episodes.overview: Hachiman tries his best to relax during Summer break but constant texts from Shizuka concerning the Service Club activities prevent him from doing so.

episodes.name: One Day, They Will Learn the Truth
episodes.overview: Shizuka readies a bonfire and a "test of courage". Later, Yui recognizes the limo that hit Hachiman.

episodes.name: For the Third Time, He Turns Back on the Path from Whence He Came
episodes.overview: Yui invites Hachiman and Komachi to the annual summer fireworks festival. The pair run into Haruno, who explains the complicated relationship between herself and Yukino.

episodes.name: The Distance Between Them Remains Unchanged as the Festival is Becoming a Carnival
episodes.overview: Yui notices a rift forming between Hachiman and Yukino. Hachiman is nominated to serve on the committee for the school’s upcoming cultural festival.

episodes.name: And So the Curtain on Each Stage Rises, and the Festival is Festivaling Its Very Best
episodes.overview: Hachiman and Yui check on Yukino. Later, Hachiman shakes things up with the committee when he decides to alter their mindset.

episodes.name: Thus, His and Her and Her Youth Continues to Be Wrong
episodes.overview: Soubu High’s Cultural Festival continues and Hachiman is stuck carrying out his duty as a committee member by documenting the day’s events on film.

episodes.name: And So, Their Festival Will Never End
episodes.overview: A mysterious request to  helm the upcoming sports festival arrives. The group must band together to figure out a way to pull it off.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
Hachiman Hikigaya is an apathetic high school student with narcissistic and semi-nihilistic tendencies. He firmly believes that joyful youth is nothing but a farce, and everyone who says otherwise is just lying to themselves.

In a novel punishment for writing an essay mocking modern social relationships, Hachiman's teacher forces him to join the Volunteer Service Club, a club that aims to extend a helping hand to any student who seeks their support in achieving their goals. With the only other club member being the beautiful ice queen Yukino Yukinoshita, Hachiman finds himself on the front line of other people's problems—a place he never dreamed he would be. As Hachiman and Yukino use their wits to solve many students' problems, will Hachiman's rotten view of society prove to be a hindrance or a tool he can use to his advantage?

episodes.name: No One Knows Why They Came to the Service Club
episodes.overview: The Service Club’s new task is to help Tobecchi find a way to confess his true feelings to Ebino, but she’s got a different agenda in mind, and it includes Hachiman.

episodes.name: His and Her Confessions Reached No One
episodes.overview: The field trip in Kyoto continues, with the Service Club trying their best to help solve their problems. Later, Hachiman makes a surprising realization.

episodes.name: Quietly, Yukinoshita Yukino Makes a Decision
episodes.overview: The tension between Yukino and Hachiman is thick enough to cut with a knife. Meanwhile, Kaker is planning something for Hina.

episodes.name: And Yuigahama Yui Makes a Declaration
episodes.overview: Hachiman ends up in an awkward situation with Orimoto, while still searching for the solution to the student election prank. However, a resolution is closer than he thinks.

episodes.name: In That Room, There is No Longer the Scent of Tea
episodes.overview: Hachiman has yet to figure out how to fix the student council president election problem. But a discussion with his sister finally gives him the ability to take action.

episodes.name: Without Incident, the Congress Dances, But Does Not Progress
episodes.overview: After the student council election, Hachiman has his reservations as to whether he made the right choice as the new president struggles with her first event.

episodes.name: Even So, That Room Continues to Play Out the Endless Days
episodes.overview: Iroha’s first event as president isn’t going well. All of the people on the partnering student council just want to look smart, but can’t actually make decisions!

episodes.name: Even Still, Hachiman Hikigaya is…
episodes.overview: After Hachiman and Yukino’s conversation, Hachiman is left contemplating the faults in his thinking. Ms. Hiratsuka offers him a car ride and her advice on the matter.

episodes.name: And, Yukino Yukinoshita is…
episodes.overview: Ms. Hiratsuka gives the trio and Iroha tickets a theme park and tells them to discover what Christmas really means.

episodes.name: The Thing That the Light in Each of Their Hands Illuminates
episodes.overview: It will take all three members of the Service Club to fix the disastrous Christmas event. After, Yui and Hachiman head out to pick a present for Yukino’s birthday.

episodes.name: Hayato Hayama Always Lives Up to Expectations
episodes.overview: While the group attempts to figure out what their respective future plans are, a rumor is sparked regarding Yukino and Hayama that makes the whole school curious.

episodes.name: Still, The Thing He Desires Is Out of Reach, And He Continues to Mistake What’s Real
episodes.overview: With the approach of Valentine’s Day, the Service Club is overwhelmed with requests regarding chocolate. In an attempt to solve the issue, Hachiman concocts a sweet plan.

episodes.name: Spring Always Comes to Life Buried Underneath a Pile of Snow
episodes.overview: An awkward visit from Yukino’s sister causes Yukino to spend the night at Yui’s. But when only Yui seems able to make up her mind, the Service Club may never be the same.

2.name: TOO!
2.overview:
This season picks up immediately after the events of the first season, continuing the adventures of the Volunteer Service Club—the dispassionate Hachiman Hikigaya, the cheerful Yui Yuigahama, and the competitive Yukino Yukinoshita—as it dedicates itself to helping any student with issues that they may face.

With the rift among his own group widening, Hachiman begins to realize that his knack for quickly getting to the root of other people's troubles is a double-edged sword: sometimes the best solution is not necessarily the most appropriate one.

episodes.name: In Due Time, the Seasons Change and the Snow Melts
episodes.overview: After Yukino announced that she was ready to name her request to the Service Club, a long silence followed… but that silence is about to broken.

episodes.name: That Key Was Never Handled Until Today
episodes.overview: Isshiki approaches the Service Club with and interesting proposition, but Yukino would like to handle this time-sensitive challenge on her own.

episodes.name: Iroha Isshiki is the Strongest Junior, as Expected
episodes.overview: What is a prom, exactly? Yukino and Iroha have a plan to show both Hachiman and the student body the answer to that question… with Yui’s help, of course!

episodes.name: By Chance, Yui Yuigahama Thinks of the Future
episodes.overview: The Student Council’s prom plans sour after a shocking school policy reversal — and to make matters worse, an unexpectedly familiar messenger delivers the bad news.

episodes.name: Shizuka Hiratsuka Deeply Longs for the Days Past
episodes.overview: Hachiman is determine to help bring the prom to life, but Yukino isn’t keen on accepting his help. Luckily Hachiman has a plan — one that uniquely involves the Service Club.

episodes.name: Once again, Hachiman Hikigaya Makes a Speech
episodes.overview: First step in Hachiman’s plan? Rally the troops! Together they’ll create a prom proposal so awful, the PTO will have no choice but to choose Yukino’s instead.

episodes.name: Until the End, Yui Yuigahama Will Continue Watching Over Them
episodes.overview: For Hachiman’s plan to succeed, they’ll need allies from other schools. Communicating with those allies, however, is easier said than done…

episodes.name: Wishing That, at the Very Least, I Don't Make Any More Mistakes
episodes.overview: Pushing a dummy event like a second prom is a great idea on Hachiman’s part, but the tactic isn’t foolproof against Yukino’s mother. Good thing he has an ace up his sleeve…

episodes.name: A Whiff of That Fragrance Will Always Bring Memories of That Season
episodes.overview: Hachiman has a new objective: granting Yui’s wish. First step? Help her bake something delicious for Komachi, and perhaps include Yui’s mom’s “secret ingredient.”

episodes.name: Gallantly, Shizuka Hiratsuka Moves Forward
episodes.overview: Will prom succeed without a hitch? Or is the real trouble lying in wait once prom comes to an end?

episodes.name: Only a Heated Touch Truly Conveys the Sentiment
episodes.overview: Now that the club has disbanded, they’ll continue to drift even further apart — but before they do, Yui has one final wish to make.

episodes.name: My Teen Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected
episodes.overview: One final hurdle, and the prom situation will finally be over… but will Hachiman’s search for something genuine be so easily resolved?

3.name: Climax
3.overview: The messy emotions of Hachiman, Yukino and Yui won't be easily expressed, and as the members of the Service Club band together to host a school prom, they will have to put their feelings into words and truly learn to understand each other at long last... if the Service Club can even stay afloat, that is!
